meanings.definition: To go somewhere quickly or suddenly.
meanings.sent1: He hotfooted to the store to buy some milk.
meanings.sent2: The children hotfooted to the playground as soon as school ended.
meanings.sent3: She hotfooted to her friend's house when she heard the exciting news.
meanings.sent4: The cat hotfooted out of the room when it heard the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent5: The dog hotfooted to the door when it heard its owner's car pull up.
